column2:
seed <- sample(10000, 1)
# Optimize the variance criterion
# (tends to maximize similarity in feature means)
features$anticlusters <- anticlustering(
  features,
  K = 3,
  objective = "variance",
  categories = schaper2019$room,
  nrep = 10000,
  parallelize = TRUE,
  standardize = TRUE,
  seed = seed 
)

Fehler in validate_input(features, "features", c("data.frame", "matrix",  : 
  features must be of class 'data.frame' or 'matrix' or 'numeric' or 'integer' or 'double'
